definitions.definition: A French royalist who believes that the King of France and Navarre must be chosen according to the simple application of the Salic law .
Any proponent for the rule of a legitimate sovereign .

main_definition: ( historical ) A French royalist who believes that the King of France and Navarre must be chosen according to the simple application of the Salic law .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any proponent for the rule of a legitimate sovereign .
